alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 9:52AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lower Keys in Monroe County through 1015 AM EDT... At 951 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm producing a waterspout over Key West, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Waterspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally hazardous waters. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key West, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Boca Chica, Big Coppitt Key, Fleming Key, Key Haven, Sunset Key and Geiger Key. WATERSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
